name: Rugrats: Totally Angelica
description: Rugrats: Totally Angelica is an action game based on the 1991 television series Rugrats. It was developed by Art Co., Ltd and published by THQ for the Game Boy Color (GBC) and PlayStation. The GBC version was released in 2000, while the PlayStation version was published one year later. It is also the last game released for the PlayStation and Game Boy Color. a direct sequel for the PC was released also in 2000, titled Totally Angelica: Boredom Busters!. It was a point and click adventure game, and was published by Mattel Interactive.
